column1: Clinical Ophthalmology and Vision Science MSc
column5: The Clinical Ophthalmology and Vision Science MSc programme is aimed at intercalating medical students and will provide you with the opportunity to develop in-depth applied knowledge, clinical practice, research skills and professional behaviours in the connected fields of clinical ophthalmology and vision science.INTRODUCTIONThis programme has been developed through the close collaboration of clinicians in St Paul’s Eye Unit and academic staff in the Department of Eye and Vision Science. You will learn about the scientific research leading to a greater understanding of vision, the mechanisms of disease leading to loss of vision and the transformative technologies being developed leading to new therapies and treatment strategies.
